doc:
James Brolin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Brolin 0 James Brolin (; born Craig Kenneth Bruderlin, July 18, 1940) is an American actor, producer, and director, best known for his roles in film and television, including sitcoms and soap operas. He is the father of actor Josh Brolin and husband of Barbra Streisand. Brolin has won two Golden Globes and an Emmy. He received a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame on August 10, 2016. James_Brolin ( ; born Craig_Kenneth_Bruderlin , July_18_,_1940 ) is an_American_actor , producer , and director , best_known for his_roles in film_and_television , including sitcoms and soap_operas . He is the_father of actor_Josh_Brolin_and_husband of Barbra_Streisand . Brolin has_won two_Golden_Globes and an_Emmy . He received a_star on the_Hollywood_Walk of Fame on August_10_,_2016 .
